name: 乔治·加拉格尔
name_full: 乔治·加拉格尔 George Gallagher
introduction: George Gallagher is a critically acclaimed actor, having appeared in numerous productions on the New York Stage and in the UK, with notable performances at The Irish Arts Center and the Obie Award-winning Classical Theater of Harlem where he performed in Caligula opposite Andre DeShields. He drew praise for his role in the SlamDance hit OVER THE GW, ALTERED STATES OF PLAINE and the cult hit THE ABSTRACTION. Next, he can be seen opposite Vivica A. Fox in the soon-to-be-released Garlic & Gunpowder, and as Special Agent Alton on the Amazon series Backstabber.After drama school, George trained under legendary teacher and director Gene Frankel, who pioneered the Off Broadway movement in New York. Further studies have been under the tutelage of acting legends Wynn Handman, Terry Schreiber, Milton Katselas, Austin Pendleton, and Harold Guskin.
